evidence.claim: Anagram emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations for handling health information.
The company supports various health transactions, including X12 EDI formats, crucial for healthcare interoperability.
Anagram leverages FHIR standards for health data exchange, enhancing interoperability with EHRs.
The API documentation mentions support for HL7 standards for data sharing and exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Anagram has capabilities for HIPAA-compliant data exchange and mentions using X12 formats.
